title: King of the cats (K)
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Morton Schindel
brief_description: Old Tom the cat stares at his master, the gravedigger, as he tells of an eerie encounter with nine cats mournfully bearing a coffin through the graveyard.
description: Old Tom the cat stares at his master, the gravedigger, as he tells of an eerie encounter with nine cats mournfully bearing a coffin through the graveyard.
